Projects.name: Cowboys n' Stuff
Projects.description: Cowboys n' Stuff is a 2D, Top-down, wave-survival orientated game where you control and customise your cowboy in order to eliminate threats as they arrive; whether it is day or night...

Projects.name: 3D PCG Animation
Projects.description: Procedural animation is a great way to dynamically position character joints without spending lots of time creating animation trees. In this case, I use PCG animation to make dynamic walk cycles.

Projects.name: Gruttel Scuttle
Projects.description: Gruttel Scuttle is a fast-paced strategy management game, proudly produced by Trojan Mouse, a dedicated team of second-year game development students.

Projects.name: Conjoined Game
Projects.description: This is a combat adventure game filled with challenging puzzles. You must gather a key from a gigantic killer robot called a hattertron; programmed by Odious Keith. Destroying it will drop a key allowing you to enter Odious Keith's castle.

Projects.name: Comp280 TankGame
Projects.description: This is a Uni module where programming students were tasked to create a "Prototype Game" which had 3 components in it (AI, Networking and UI)

Projects.name: Comp250 GOAP AI
Projects.description: This is a Uni module where programming students were tasked to create some sort of complex AI algorithm.

Projects.name: Gam340 AI Project
Projects.description: This is a Uni module where all students were tasked to create a strong artifact to place on our portfolio sites.

Projects.name: Discord Bots
Projects.description: During my own time, I have developed various discord bots to help with various tasks.
